response.overview: Title: Doraemon: Nobita's New Dinosaur  Release Date: August 7, 2020  Genre: Animation, Adventure, Family  Plot Summary: Nobita and his friends discover a dinosaur egg that hatches into two baby dinosaurs, Kyu and Myu. Using a time machine, they travel to the age of dinosaurs to find their home. They face various challenges and prehistoric creatures, learning about friendship, courage, and responsibility along the way.  Director: Kazuaki Imai  Language: Japanese  Runtime: 110 minutes  Production Companies: Shin-Ei Animation, TV Asahi, Shogakukan, Toho
response.tagline: Journey to the Past, Save the Future!
response.title: Doraemon Nobita s New Dinosaur
